headline: How Recent Developments Are Rewriting The Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) Investment Story
summary: The fair value estimate on Royal Caribbean Cruises has moved to $362.04 per share from $331.04. That shift largely traces back to how analysts are rethinking cruise demand trends, pricing power, and regional risks. Recent Street research shows both higher and lower price targets, with bullish views leaning on resilient booking and spending data, and cautious views pointing to Caribbean yield pressure and geopolitical uncertainty. Read on to see how you can keep track of these changing...

headline: Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) Valuation Check After Strong Results And Double Digit 2026 Growth Guidance
summary: Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) is back in focus after reporting fourth quarter and full year 2025 earnings, issuing double digit revenue guidance for 2026, and outlining further expansion of its ship pipeline. See our latest analysis for Royal Caribbean Cruises. The strong earnings, 2026 guidance and new ship agreements have come alongside a 90 day share price return of 35.93% and a one year total shareholder return of 33.30%, while the five year total shareholder return is above 4x, which...
